divs: Sighting DetailsJust arrived at home in country, exited car, saw bright white approaching fromN.W. first thought was low flying aircraft w landing lights on. Tried to recordwith handy-cam,battery dead. watched and memorized detail. Called wifeat her location to go outside to look. 75 yds. long, approx. shape triangular,no sound of propulsion, trailing golden threads with what looked like glowingchristmas tree globes attached, trailing approx. 150 yds. behind. Disappearedbehind tree line, gaining altitude slowly. Newspaper described it as a Russianrocket burning up on re-entry. The object was extremely high at the time of thewitnesses in the city. Can identify Longitude, latitude, and approx. site oftake-off. Will have to look up. Bob Paillet 903- 523 4710. missyjose@aol.com
Summary: Close up view of object in flight
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around July 31st 1992
